dmca.title: Abuse of our Copyright by one of your clients.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: James [mailto:cjscooter@netmart.com] 
Sent: Monday, October 04, 2004 11:12 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Abuse of our Copyright by one of your clients.

 

 

Hi,

 

In reviewing our access logs, we found strange activity from an IP address
that belongs to theplanet.com (69.93.189.108). After some investigation we
discovered  that (www.lcshells.net) is a complete duplicate of our web
site(www3.netmart.com), including certain functions which belong exclusively
to our web site  (example: our live chat support still pops up on the
offending web site). The fact that these functions are still present tells
us that this is no coincedence and the site design had been stolen. The site
design is our intellectual property and cost us several thousand dollars to
be implemented and is key to our branding strategy.

 

We have a good faith belief that the use of our design/functions/graphics
was never authorized to this web site and also believe this is a violation
of  Title 17, Section 512, of The United States Code governing copyright
infringement.

 

Further, I, James Dahan, under penalty of perjury, believe that the
information presented is accurate and am authorized to act on behalf of
NetMart Inc, the owner of the infringed copyrighted content.

 

James Dahan

COO

 

(514)940-0495

fax(514)940-0498

 

james@netmart.com 

 

NetMart Inc
218 Southern Country Lane
Quincy Florida
32351 USA
